name: Closed 2016 Signature Suit
description: 47 has learned how to close his jacket on his signature suit. The 2016 model! Install it for Peacock or replace the signature suits of your choice.

options.name: Do not install
options.tooltip: Do not install the closed 2016 suit with gloves.

options.name: Peacock Addon
options.tooltip: Install the closed 2016 suit with gloves to your game as an addon without replacing existing suits. This will only work if you're playing with Peacock.

english.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: A bespoke modern suit with white point-collar shirt. Single-colour burgundy tie.

french.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: Costume emblématique de 47 avec gants (Veste fermée)
Un costume sur-mesure moderne porté avec une chemise blanche avec un col en pointe et une cravate bordeaux.

german.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: Klassischer Anzug von 47 mit Handschuhen (Geschlossene Jacke)
Maßgeschneiderter modischer Anzug und weißes Hemd mit Kentkragen. Einfarbige burgunderrote Krawatte.

spanish.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: Traje característico de 47 con guantes (Chaqueta cerrada)
Un moderno traje a medida con camisa blanca de cuello italiano. Corbata lisa color burdeos.

italian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: Abito classico di 47 con guanti (Giacca chiusa)
Un completo moderno e fatto su misura. Accompagnato da una camicia bianca e da una cravatta in tinta unita color borgogna.

russian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: Сшитый на заказ современный костюм. Белая рубашка с острыми концами воротника. Однотонный галстук винного цвета.

chineseSimplified.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: 带手套的47专有西装（封闭式外套）
一套带尖领衬衫的定制现代西装。纯酒红色领带。

chineseTraditional.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: 47的招牌西裝搭手套（封閉式外套）
訂製的現代西裝配白色尖領襯衫。單色酒紅領帶。

japanese.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_GL: 47愛用スーツと手袋(クローズドジャケット)
特注のスーツとポイントカラーシャツ。そしてワインレッドのネクタイ。

options.name: 47's Signature Suit
options.tooltip: Replace 47's Signature Suit, with the closed 2016 suit with gloves.

options.name: 47's Signature Suit with Gloves
options.tooltip: Replace 47's Signature Suit with Gloves, with the closed 2016 suit with gloves.

options.name: Do not install
options.tooltip: Do not install the closed 2016 suit.

options.name: Peacock Addon
options.tooltip: Install the closed 2016 suit to your game as an addon without replacing existing suits. This will only work if you're playing with Peacock.

english.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: A bespoke modern suit with black leather gloves. Single-colour burgundy tie. White point-collar shirt.

french.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: Un costume sur-mesure moderne porté avec des gants en cuir noir, une chemise blanche avec un col en pointe et une cravate bordeaux.

german.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: Maßgeschneiderter modischer Anzug mit schwarzen Lederhandschuhen. Einfarbige burgunderrote Krawatte. Weißes Hemd mit Kentkragen.

spanish.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: Un moderno traje a medida con guantes de cuero negros. Corbata lisa color burdeos. Camisa con cuello italiano.

italian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: Un completo moderno e fatto su misura, accompagnato da una camicia bianca e da una cravatta in tinta unita color borgogna.

russian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: Сшитый на заказ современный костюм с черными кожаными перчатками. Однотонный галстук винного цвета. Белая рубашка с острыми концами воротника.

chineseSimplified.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: 带黑色皮手套的定制现代西装。纯酒红色领带。白色尖领衬衫。

chineseTraditional.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: 訂製的現代西裝配上黑色皮製手套。單色酒紅領帶。白色尖領襯衫。

japanese.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_CLOSED_2016_SUIT_NO: 47愛用スーツ(クローズドジャケット)
モダンな特注スーツと黒の革手袋。ワインレッドの無地のネクタイ。白のポイントカラーシャツ。
